==Criticism and controversy==
==Criticism and controversy==
â
Despite Google's apparent success it has also managed to become the target of critics. In the summer of 2005 Google's name has been associated with commercial contracts between the Government of China and Microsoft and CISCO which block access to websites using words like "democracy." Google has been involved with the removal of specific sites that are blocked in China from their Chinese news portal.
+
Despite Google's apparent success it has also managed to become the target of critics. In the summer of 2005 Google's name has been associated with commercial contracts between the Government of China, Microsoft and CISCO which block access to websites using words like "democracy." Google has been involved with the removal of specific sites that are blocked in China from their Chinese news portal.
